charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was out exploring
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a pair of roars booming
from deep in the mountains.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1101_020:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] hurried to investigate, only to stumble upon
a surprising scene.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_040: Very well. Then let the battle...
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_060:
Another battle well fought. You’re making
excellent progress, Kommo-o.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_080: Did you happen to see that battle just now?
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0401_100:
Did you hear that, Kommo-o? What a compliment!
And from [Name:PlayerNickname ], no less.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0402_120:
Thank you! I’ll make sure to pass on your
compliment to her.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_130:
I’m impressed you found this place. It’s our secret
training grounds.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_140:
Since you can only bring a single partner to
battles here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_150:
I bring Kommo-o and Garchomp here often
so they can do some sparring and compare
their strength.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_160:
Actually, since you’re here, I ought to give you
two a proper introduction!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_170:
This is Kommo-o. He and I partner up when I
change into this sygna suit.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_180: I raised him from an Egg I received in Alola.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0401_200:
That’s right! He’s come a long way. He hatched
from that Egg as a little Jangmo-o, and now two
evolutions later, just look at him!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0402_230:
It’s been such a joy to watch him grow into the
Pokémon he is today.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_240:
It’s hard to believe you were once that little
Jangmo-o that used to struggle in our training
sessions. You’ve come a long way since then!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_250:
He’s been competing with Garchomp from the
moment he hatched.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_260:
Their rivalry ran as deep as their bond. Not a day
went by without him challenging Garchomp to
a battle.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_270: And if I remember right, he would lose every time.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_280:
Sounds like Kommo-o wants me to stop dredging
up the past. Hehe! Such a sore loser, this one.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_290:
Once he evolved into Kommo-o, though, 
that’s when he really began to hold his own
against Garchomp.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_300:
Then one day, the sygna suit designer saw
Kommo-o and offered to make an outfit for me
to wear with him.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_310:
From that moment, I decided I would take on the
PML wearing this sygna suit, with Kommo-o at
my side.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0301_320: You’ve put a lot of trust in Kommo-o!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0401_330: He’s earned it! He’s the gutsiest Pokémon I know.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0302_340: And a new sync pair was born!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0402_350:
Yes, indeed. I want to take on new challenges
with him as my partner, and I have no doubt that
he’ll live up to my expectations.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_360:
But when I decided to partner up with Kommo-o,
one thought did cross my mind...
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_380:
On Pasio, the Pokémon that inspires a Trainer’s
sygna suit is meant to be their ace. Losing a battle
while wearing a sygna suit is unacceptable.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_390:
And for me, a Pokémon League Champion, that’s
especially true. So why did I not choose Garchomp
when she’s fought by my side for so long?
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_400:
In the end, Kommo-o’s example is what made me
change my mind.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_410:
As a Champion, I have a reputation to maintain.
But if I played it safe just to defend my reputation,
I’d be depriving myself of so many possibilities.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_420:
If I stopped taking risks because I was afraid of
losing face, what example would I be setting for
other Trainers?
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_430: Certainly not one that befits a Champion!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_440:
A good Champion is prepared to face any and all
challenges without fear of defeat!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_450:
Like a little Jangmo-o challenging a full-grown
Garchomp to battle every day!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_460: Hehe. Sorry, I got a little too passionate just now.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0301_470: You two are a great match!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0401_480:
My thoughts exactly. Seeing how far he has come
inspires me to do the same.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0302_490:
You have to work hard for
Garchomp’s sake, too!
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_0402_500:
You’re right! Garchomp won’t accept anything
less than my best.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_520:
I guess we should wrap this up. Kommo-o sounds
eager to face some new opponents! Maybe this
conversation lit a fire in him, too.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_530:
And I’m not the type of Champion who’s content
to rest on my laurels, either.
charaepi_ch0091_01_shirona/2301_1201_540:
Kommo-o and I, we’re going to keep charging
ahead down the road of possibility!
